FuncDef: This mandatory command enables access to a card s MCM CLI context to configure MCMs.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the MCM slot number to be configured. Even slot numbers 2 to 12 are invalid. MCM provisioning is not required to provision Compact Media Adapters (CMAs). Values-7750 SR-c4: 1, 3
7750 SR-c12: 		1, 3, 5, 7, 9, 11.
